content: {"name": "Maryland Access Point, Anne Arundel County, Aging and Disability Resource Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "AGING AND DISABILITY RESOURCE CENTER: Provides assistance to individuals who are seeking long-term support information and counseling regarding available long-term support options, and determining eligibility for public long-term support programs and benefits. Benefits screening includes level of care determinations for Medicaid home and community-based service waiver programs. Offers in-person and over the phone assistance to individuals, families, and caregivers and referrals to programs/benefits (such as health education, nutrition, income support programs and more). *** Also assists older adults and adults with disabilities apply for the Homeowners' and Renters' Tax Credit program. The gross household income cannot exceed $60,000. ***", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2666 Riva Road, 2nd Floor", "address_2": null, "city": "Annapolis", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "21401", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.97436, "longitude": -76.56057}, "phones": [{"number": "(410) 222-4257", "type": "voice"}]}
